title: Project for Developing ICT-Enabled Universal Design for Learning (UDL) Strategies for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Disabilities and Experience with ICT Tools
context.additional_context: Adult professionals collaborate in smartphone-centric limited technology environments to design ICT-based educational solutions for students with disabilities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more ICT tools suitable for specific disability types and propose project implementation strategies.
Learners can design two or more accessibility-enhancement strategies based on UDL principles.
Learners can develop one prototype of a digital educational resource implementable in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
